title: Another Round: How a film about a drinking experiment became a celebration of life
description: Another Round sees four men on an alcohol experiment and has become an Oscar-nominated success.

title: Inner Light: The children surviving conflict in DR Congo
description: Hugh Kinsella Cunningham documents the lives of children caught up in conflict in DR Congo.

title: 'Brilliant Foden has final word over fellow emerging superstar Haaland - for now'
description: On a night when headlines were focused on Borussia Dortmund superstar Erling Braut Haaland, it was Manchester City's Phil Foden who had the final word.

title: 'I could photograph space my entire life'
description: A paediatrician describes how his love of space observation has grown during the lockdown.

title: How one woman discovered her true cultural heritage
description: Gail Lukasik's life was turned upside down when she discovered her mother was mixed race but had 'passed' as white to escape racial segregation in the US.

title: Why Utah is making men pay women's pregnancy costs
description: Fathers in Utah will soon be legally obligated to foot half the bill of a mother's pregnancy.

title: China one-child policy: can dropping limits increase birth rates?
description: The government is considering dropping birth limits in some parts to offset an ageing population.

title: Hazmat crew called in to clean US house
description: The resident has been dealing with depression and fatigue following a stroke over 20 years ago.

title: Snow in Wales: Sunny Easter weather a distant memory
description: From Llanbrynmair to Llandovery, the white stuff made an unseasonable return as spring got under way.

title: Jordan crisis: How Prince Hamzah and Saudi Arabia fit in
description: Saudi officials categorically deny suggestions their country had any role in an alleged coup attempt.

title: Horsey seal with plastic ring on neck for years is rescued
description: "Mrs Vicar" is being cared for at an RSPCA centre after having the plastic ring removed by vets.

title: Dutch crew rescued from 'near-capsize'
description: The crew were forced to abandon ship when the sea got really rough.

title: Why is the EU unhappy with AstraZeneca?
description: The EU has called on AstraZeneca to "catch up" on its deliveries to the EU.

title: Bronze Age slab found in France is oldest 3D map in Europe
description: The Bronze Age engravings are a map of part of Brittany, north-west France, researchers believe.

title: Mother-daughter relationship turned upside down by Covid
description: Margaret and Cordelia have seen a reversal in their financial relationship due to the pandemic.

title: Masters leader Rose out at 14:36 BST - Friday's round two tee times
description: Lee Westwood will play with defending champion and world number one Dustin Johnson in the first two rounds of the 85th Masters at Augusta National.

title: Chris Sutton: 'I believe heading a football killed my dad'
description: Chris Sutton has opened up about the struggle of watching his dad, footballer Mike Sutton, suffer with dementia.

title: Huber case: Nazi police chief in Vienna spied for West Germany
description: German spy agency reveals that a top Nazi who sent Jews to their deaths helped it after the war.

title: PSNI say 41 officers injured during NI rioting
description: Ten arrests have been made in recent days, with further violence in Carrickfergus and Londonderry on Monday.

title: Covid: DVLA staff strike over 'fear' at Swansea HQ
description: DVLA staff are "scared to go to work", a union says, as a four-day strike starts in Swansea.

title: Covid in Scotland: Secondary schools to return full time after Easter
description: Primary schools are already back full time but secondary schools had been using blended learning.

title: Covid passports: Certification is 'one option', vaccines minister says
description: Introducing Covid status certificates risks creating a "two-tier Britain", critics say.

title: Friday Night Dinner star Paul Ritter dies
description: Tributes are paid to the actor, who played dad Martin Goodman in the hit Channel 4 comedy.

title: English local elections: Ed Davey urges local funds for green projects
description: The Liberal Democrat leader says local councils should be given a bigger role over climate policies.

title: Tool checks phone numbers from Facebook data breach
description: A new online tool lets users check their phone numbers against the leaked database.

title: Birmingham players complain to club about 'unfavourable' conditions
description: Birmingham City manager Carla Ward is acting as conduit between club and players after the squad sent a letter complaining about conditions.

title: 'I forgot to tell my parents I was England captain'
description: England centre Emily Scarratt says having a final in this year's reformatted Women's Six Nations could help the side's World Cup preparations.

title: Latest Trends: A1 x J1 on how Houseparty changed their lives
description: Fame, number two in the charts and a remix with Aitch. It's been a life-changing year for A1 x J1.

title: Peacocks stores back in business but only half will reopen
description: Half the fashion chain's 400 stores will reopen, saving 2,000 jobs, but the rest are left behind.

title: Richard Okorogheye: Police find body in search for missing student
description: Richard Okorogheye was last seen by his family on 22 March, when he left their home in west London.

title: Capt Sir Tom 100: Family unveils NHS fundraiser's 'birthday challenge'
description: People are encouraged to raise money on what would have been the late NHS fundraiser's birthday.

title: Hunter Biden on addiction: My life is not a tabloid
description: The US president's son talks to the BBC about addiction, grief and his scrutinised work in Ukraine.

title: EasyJet: Two test travel plan is too expensive
description: The airline says the cost of pre and post-travel testing could exceed the price of a plane ticket.

title: 'He loves trash talking with Michael Jordan' - the making of Masters champion Johnson
description: A poker face and single-minded resolve - how Dustin Johnson matured into the Masters champion.

title: Stephen Hendry beats Jimmy White in World Championship qualifying
description: Seven-time world champion Stephen Hendry beats old rival Jimmy White in the first round of qualifying for this year's World Championship.

title: FND: ‘The most common condition you’ve never heard of’
description: Cassie, 18, suffers seizures and memory loss because of the neurological complaint FND.

title: The Papers: 'Cheers' at roadmap - but normal 'some way off'
description: Most of Tuesday's newspapers focus on Boris Johnson's press conference about easing lockdown.
